(FLDB *) + get_db
 Returns the application's pointer to the open database.

Detailed Description

Wrapper around EGODatabase.

Holds the pointer to the real sqlite object and provides additional wrapper helper functions to handle the database.

Definition at line 27 of file FLDB.h.

Member Function Documentation

+ (FLDB *) get_db

Returns the application's pointer to the open database.

Nil if where were problems.

- (NSDate *) get_tab_timestamp: (int)  tab

Returns the last modification date of the specified tab.

If not available, will return the reference date of 1970.

- (NSData *) load_meta_data: (NSString*)  table
the_id: (int)  the_id
owner: (int)  owner
url: (NSString*)  url 

Retrieves from the database some metadata.

Pass the url to verify that the remote URL on the server has not changed, wich would invalidate the local cache.

Definition at line 424 of file FLDB.m.

Referenced by FLMeta_data_connection::get_memory_cache:token:.

+ (FLDB *) open_database

Called once per application, initialises the global application database.

This function will generate the database tables if they weren't present. Returns the FLDB pointer with a retain count of one or nil if there were problems and the application should abort.

Definition at line 60 of file FLDB.m.

References path.

Referenced by FlokiAppDelegate::animate_tab_controller.

- (void) purge_meta_items: (NSString*)  parent_table
data_tables: (NSString**)  data_tables
to_delete: (NSArray*)  to_delete
owner: (int)  owner 

Removes all the meta items of the array children of the specified owner.

Pass a nil terminated array of child tables that have to be purged as well. Note that this function won't do anything if the array is empty.

Definition at line 328 of file FLDB.m.

Referenced by FLNews_view_controller::process_response:, and FLGallery_view_controller::process_response:.

- (void) purge_stale_meta_items: (NSString*)  parent_table
data_tables: (NSString**)  data_tables
lowest_id: (int)  lowest_id
owner: (int)  owner 

Purges entries from the meta table.

The function will purge all meta elements lesser than lowest_id. If lowest_id is zero or negative, however, all items for the owner will be discarded. This function also purges cache for the data tables. Pass as data_tables an NSString* nil terminated array.

to_preserve: (NSArray*)  to_preserve 

Purges sections from the cache.

Pass the owner for the sections and the list of items you want to keep.

- (NSArray *) read_meta_items: (NSString*)  parent_table
owner: (int)  owner 

Reads all the owner related elements from the parent table.

Returns an array of NSDictionary objects generated from parsing the JSON stored in the individual tables. These NSDictionary should be ripe to convert into meta objects.

Definition at line 365 of file FLDB.m.

References read_meta_items:owner:.

- (BOOL) register_tab: (NSString*)  name
unique_id: (int)  unique_id 

Used by the tabs when called by register_tables to register the table.

Stores the name and key in the Owners table or updates the name. Returns NO if there was a problem, you should abort execution then.

Definition at line 151 of file FLDB.m.

- (void) remove_tabs: (NSArray*)  id_list

Removes from Owners the tables specified in the identifier list.

The function will remove associated data in related tables.
